citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:46 AM on
21-FEB-18.
The inspector knocked on the front door of the residence and then called the licensee. The licensee stated he was
not available for an inspection at that time.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:46 AM on
21-FEB-18.
The inspector knocked on the front door of the residence and then called the licensee. The licensee stated he was
not available for an inspection at that time.
